channel.title: Para-2 Testnet Mining Guide on Phala Network Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Para-2 Testnet Mining Guide on Phala Network Wiki

item.title: Claim Test Token from Telegram Bot
item.description: The following tutorials apply to Para-2 Testnet, which shares the same tokenomics parameters as the future Khala. Before you start mining in Para-2 Testnet, you need to first get a Khala account and acquire test token from faucet (real PHA is needed in future Khala mining). Claim Test Token from Telegram Bot Get to Phala Faucet https://t.me/phalafaucet. You may need to download and install Telegram as prompted. Click “VIEW IN TELEGRAM” to join the group.
